```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

```{r}
pups_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv")
pups_df = janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
```

## 
'select' is used to select colums! 

```{r}
select(litters_df, group, litter_number, gd0_weight)

select(litters_df, group, gd0_weight:gd_of_birth)

select(litters_df, group, starts_with("pups"))

select(litters_df, -litter_number)
select(litters_df, -starts_with ("gd"))

select(litters_df, group, litter_id = litter_number)

select(litters_df, group, litters_id = litter_number, everything())

select(litters_df, gd0_weight, everything())
```

```{r}
rename(litters_df, litter_id = litter_number)

relocate (litters_df, litter_number)
```




'select' vs 'pull'

```{r}
select(litters_df, group)
pull(litters_df, group)
```
